title: Lasted around a year with heavy and rough use
content: Writing this review while I am looking for replacement for these slippers after using it for around a month in construction site. I would say with normal usage it will last atleast 2 years. And now also the slipper is in good condition only the grip is lost and these is high chance of slipping
author: Ankur katiyar
product: Sparx Mens Sf0014G Navy Grey Slipper - 8 UK (Sf0014G)

title: Good
content: Product is good but doesn't last long. Feeling like lately sparx products qualtiy have been going down. But okayish for use maybe 1-1.5 years
author: Sunny J.
product: Sparx Mens Sf0014G Navy Grey Slipper - 8 UK (Sf0014G)

title: Could Be better
content: I liked the design, but i felt it didn't fit my expectations, Such a brand could make it more durable. Just wearing it only for the week it becomes thin on one side.  also, it attracts dust and becomes dirty
author: Gopal ram
product: Sparx Mens Sf0014G Navy Grey Slipper - 8 UK (Sf0014G)

title: Ok with purchase
content: Incredibly comfortable, with a soft and plush interior that feels like walking on clouds. The fit is true to size and the quality of the materials seems to be excellent.
author: Axis Web Art Private Limited
product: Sparx Mens Sf0014G Navy Grey Slipper - 8 UK (Sf0014G)
